4 void EventAnalyser::setEventHandler(notify event_handler)
5 {
6  notify event_function; // pointer-to-function
7  event_function = event_handler; //assign event handler
8 
9  HXI_SetObserver(event_function); // tell Leica who is event handler

18 std::string EventAnalyser::getStringResult(HxiEventT* Eventer)
19 {
20  std::string string_result = "";
21  // Analyse Event Finalized
22  if (Eventer->mode == HXI_DONE_EVENT)
23  {
24  string_result = readDoneEventCmdAndValues(Eventer->cmd, Eventer->value);
25 
26  // check for scan finished
27  if (Eventer->cmd == HXI_SCAN_CMD)
28  _is_scan_finished = true;
29 
30  // check for end of video image
31  if (Eventer->cmd == HXI_SCAN_CMD)
32  _is_new_image = false;
33  }
34 
35  // Analyse Event In Progress
36  else if (Eventer->mode == HXI_PROGRESS_EVENT)
37  {
38  if (Eventer->cmd == HXI_SCAN_CMD || Eventer->cmd == HXI_RESUME_CMD)
39  {
40  _is_scan_finished = false;
41  std::string percentage = std::to_string(Eventer->value[0]*100.0);
42  string_result = "scanning progress: "+percentage+" %";
43  }
44  }
45 
46  // Analyse Video Event
47  else if (Eventer->mode == HXI_VIDEO_EVENT)
48  {
49  _is_new_image = true;
50  string_result = "Video imagen";
51  }
52 
53  return string_result;
54 }
55 
56 bool EventAnalyser::isError(HxiEventT* Eventer)
57 {
58  if (Eventer->error != 0)
59  return true;
60  return false;
61 }

63 std::string EventAnalyser::readEventValues(float value[2])
64 {
65  std::string val0 = std::to_string(value[0]);
66  std::string val1 = std::to_string(value[1]);
67 
68  return "["+val0+","+val1+"]";
69 }
70 
71 std::string EventAnalyser::readEventMode(int mode)
72 {
73  switch(mode)
74  {
75  case HXI_NO_EVENT: return "No event";
76  case HXI_DONE_EVENT: return "Done event";
77  case HXI_START_EVENT: return "Start event";
78  case HXI_PROGRESS_EVENT: return "Progress event";
79  case HXI_VIDEO_EVENT: return "Video event";
80  default: return "";
81  }
82 }
83 
84 std::string EventAnalyser::readEventCmd(int cmd)
85 {
86  switch(cmd)
87  {
88  case HXI_NO_CMD: return "No cmd";
89  case HXI_CONNECT_CMD: return "Connect cmd";
90  case HXI_DISCONNECT_CMD: return "Disconnect cmd";
91  case HXI_START_VIDEO_CMD: return "Video start cmd";
92  case HXI_STOP_VIDEO_CMD: return "Video stop cmd";
93  case HXI_ZOOM_VIDEO_CMD: return "Zoom video cmd";
94  case HXI_POINT_VIDEO_CMD: return "Point video cmd";
95  case HXI_POINT_LASER_CMD: return "Point laser cmd";
96  case HXI_GET_RANGE_CMD: return "Get Range cmd";
97  case HXI_SCAN_CMD: return "Scan cmd";
98  case HXI_IMAGE_CMD: return "Image cmd";
99  case HXI_PIX_TO_ANG_CMD: return "Pixel to angle cmd";
100  case HXI_GET_ANG_CMD: return "Get Angle cmd";
101  case HXI_SET_TILT_CMD: return "Set Tilt cmd";
102  case HXI_PAUSE_CMD: return "Pause cmd";
103  case HXI_RESUME_CMD: return "Resume cmd";
104  case HXI_CANCEL_CMD: return "Cancel cmd";
105  case HXI_UNKNOWN_CMD: return "Unknown cmd";
106  default: return "";
107  }
108 }
109 
110 std::string EventAnalyser::readDoneEventCmdAndValues(int cmd, float value[2])
111 {
112  switch(cmd)
113  {
114  case HXI_CONNECT_CMD: return "Connected";
115  case HXI_DISCONNECT_CMD: return "Disconnected";
116  case HXI_GET_ANG_CMD: return "Current angles: " + readEventValues(value);
117  case HXI_GET_RANGE_CMD: return "Scan range: " + readEventValues(value)+" m";
118  case HXI_SCAN_CMD: return "Scan Finished!";
119  case HXI_PAUSE_CMD: return "Paused";
120  case HXI_RESUME_CMD: return "Resumed";
121  case HXI_CANCEL_CMD: return "Canceled";
122  case HXI_SET_TILT_CMD: return "Tilt changed";
123  case HXI_PIX_TO_ANG_CMD: return "Pixel angles: " + readEventValues(value);
124  case HXI_START_VIDEO_CMD: return "Video started. Publishing on topic: /image";
125  case HXI_STOP_VIDEO_CMD: return "Video stoped";
126  default: return "";
127  }
128 }
129 
130 void EventAnalyser::assemblePublishMsg(leica_scanstation_msgs::EventerInfo *event_msg,
131  HxiEventT* Eventer)
132 {
133  event_msg->mode = readEventMode(Eventer->mode);
134  event_msg->cmd = readEventCmd(Eventer->cmd);
135  event_msg->error = isError(Eventer);
136  event_msg->value[0] = Eventer->value[0];
137  event_msg->value[1] = Eventer->value[1];
138 }
